div.p: USLab Specimen Body Site: Codes to describe the specimen collection body site. This value set includes all SNOMED CT concepts that are descendents of Anatomical Structure (91723000)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 91723000

publisher.value: Published by: HL7 Orders and Observations Workgroup
